summary:
Add missing vanilla recipes and add craftable clothes through spinning wheel.
Also changes a few name for a few stuffs.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds missing craftable weapons and armor to the forge. It also adds craftable clothes through a new spinning wheel which are place through out most settlements. To craft clothes, you need a misc item call \'thread\' which can be crafted with 4 tundra cotten or found through out the world. This add everything that\'s not unique craftable from all three DLC. Most of these will require you to complete a certain vanilla quest. This mod also change the name of a few weapons, armors and clothes. I didn\'t add some armors like the executioner one to the crafting list because it\'s too buggy. I\'ve placed a spinning wheel in each Hearthfire home\'s cellar.
From version 3.0, I\'ve added all missing Temper Recipes.

This mod requires kryptopyr\'s Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade mod because without it, some armors will be in the wrong category. Get it here ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34093 )

List of weapons and armors added by this mod:
Vanilla:
-Lockpick
-Forsworn Weapons and Armors
-Falmer Weapons and Armors
-Elven Light Armors
-Elven Gilded Armors
-Thieves Guild and Thieves Guild Master Armors
-Wooden Bow
-Imperial Weapons and Armors
-Stormcloak Armors
-Fur Armors
-All Guard Armors, Shields and Helmets
-All Misc Weapons (like pickaxe...)
-Archmage Robes
-DarkBrotherHood Armors and Robes
-Jester Clothes
-Greybeard Clothes
Head and Arm Bandages
-All Jarl Clothes
-All Ancient Nord Weapons
-Ghost Weapons
-Blades Weapons and Armors
-Scimitar
-Headsman Axe
-Wolf Armors
-Silver Weapons
-Penitus Oculatus Armors
-Every Non-Unique Clothes
-Circlets
-Skyforge Steel Weapons ( mace and warhammer )
-Dragon Priest Dagger

Dawnguard:
-Ancient Falmer Armors
-Hardened and Heavy Falmer Armors
-Dawnguard\'s Weapons and Armors
-Vampire Armors
-BoneHawk ring

Hearthfires:
-Wooden Sword

Dragonborn:
-Morag Tongs Armors
-Skaal Armors and Necklace
-Cultist Armors
-Ancient Nordic Pickaxe
-Riekling Spear

Temper list:
Dragon Priest Daggers
Drainblood BattleAxes
Drainheart Swords
Drainspell Bows
Falmer Supple Bows
Forks
Headsman\'s Axes
Honed Falmer Swords
Honed Falmer War Axes
Knifes
Nord Hero Bows
Keening
Pickaxes
Scaled Horn Armor
Shivs
Shrouded Maskless Hood
Silver Greatswords
Silver Swords
Skyforge Steel Daggers
Supple Ancient Nord Bows
Studded Imperial Armor
The Ebony Blade
The Jagged Crown
The Masque of Clavicus Vile
The Nightingale Blade leveled weapon 5
The Shield of Solitude
The Shield of Ysgramor
The Tumblerbane Gloves
The Woodsman\'s Friend
Woodcutter\'s Axes
Worn Dark Brotherhood Armor
Wuuthrad



REQUIREMENTS:
Update 1.8.151.0.7 or higher
Dawnguard DLC
Hearthfire DLC
Dragonborn DLC
Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade (by kryptopyr) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34093


INSTALLATION:
Put the EnhancedCrafting.esp into your \'Data\' folder inside your Skyrim folder.
Or click the Download With Manager.

COMPATIBILITY:
This mod uses the same spinning wheel as cloak of skyrim so there would be an identical spinning wheel that craft different things. (MY MOD IS COMPATIBLE WITH IT)
This mod will obviously conflict with other mods that make vanilla weapons and armors craftable.
REMEMBER TO HAVE MY MOD LOWER THAN \'WEAPONS AND ARMOR FIXES REMADE\' IN THE LOAD ORDER.


ADDED TEMPER FOR ALL MISSING RECIPES:
Dragon Priest Daggers
Drainblood BattleAxes
Drainheart Swords
Drainspell Bows
Falmer Supple Bows
Forks
Headsman\'s Axes
Honed Falmer Swords
Honed Falmer War Axes
Knifes
Nord Hero Bows
Keening
Pickaxes
Scaled Horn Armor
Shivs
Shrouded Maskless Hood
Silver Greatswords
Silver Swords
Skyforge Steel Daggers
Supple Ancient Nord Bows
Studded Imperial Armor
The Ebony Blade
The Jagged Crown
The Masque of Clavicus Vile
The Nightingale Blade leveled weapon 5
The Shield of Solitude
The Shield of Ysgramor
The Tumblerbane Gloves
The Woodsman\'s Friend
Woodcutter\'s Axes
Worn Dark Brotherhood Armor
Wuuthrad



CREDITS:
Bethesda - For such an amazing game
Stroti (Tamira) - For her realistic \'spinning wheel\' meshes and textures
kryptopyr - For her \'Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade\' mod
headbomb - For his essential \'Weapons and Armor Fixes\' mod
InsanitySorrow - For his \'spool\' meshes and textures
Everyone who download my mod :)
author: Thefalloutdud123

files.name: Enhanced Crafting Version 6
files.changelogHtml:
Added Moth Priest Robes
Added Temple Priest Robes
Added East Empire Necklace
Added Telvanni Robes
Added the 9 Divines Amulets
Fixed a few crafting recipes
Skaal Armor can now be tempered
Dented Iron Shield can now be tempered
Wooden Dragon Priest Mask can now be tempered
Movarth's Boots can now be tempered
Aetherial Crown can no longer be tempered because it is a circlet
Added all Dunmer Variant Outfits
